original_text: Benjamin is like a hungry wolf. He kills an animal and eats it in the morning. In the evening, he gives what remains to his people.’
korean_text: 베냐민은 물어뜯는 이리라 아침에는 빼앗은 것을 먹고 저녁에는 움킨 것을 나누리로다

sentences.original_text: Benjamin is like a hungry wolf
and eats it in the morning
he gives what remains to his people
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 남은 것을 자기 백성에게 준다
